I don't know. Our armor will buy us some time, but I don't know how much. We need to find a way out, but... How? What do we do?
Hermod and Urd should be here with us, right? Let's find them first.

Shattered Hope.Line: You were right about the armor. I'd hate to think what would've happened to us without it.
It's too late... Darkness is... in my heart...
Don't give up hope. Help is coming.

Darkness Disguised.Line: You were to wait at the badlands.
How was Ventus? Whatever. Good riddance.
I did this for him. Not you.
What do you mean, old man? Switching sides on me now?
Hold your tongue, boy. You may be pure darkness, but you are no match for my blade.
G-got it.

Long ago, there were thirteen ancient darknesses. The most primitive of shadows. Formless. The Keyblade Masters of old rendered themselves as vessels to trap the most powerful seven within their bodies. Of the six that remained, four were imprisoned by Keyblade wielders in the world comprised of data. And two were destroyed when the world collapsed... But one survived, it is said, and disguised itself as an ally of light. Perhaps it hides inside one of us, here in this time. Tell me, Vanitas. As a being of darkness, what do you think?
Hmph. I think it has nothing to do with me.
Is that so? Darkness was once whole. And though fractured since, their minds were once connected. You must know where the others are.
I'm my own being.
That was once part of a whole? Hypothetically, if you were the darkness in question, why would it be necessary for you to hide? What would be the reason to conceal your existence?
Who knows?
Fear, perhaps?
And what exactly would I have to fear?
Light.
Ha! You think I'm afraid of Ventus? You're dreaming.

His heart was not split into light and darkness- you were not born from it. You inhabited his heart, I surmise. And if that's true, where did you and he come from? Ventus appeared in my dreams as a young lad. Our meeting was not by chance.
... What do you know?
What is there to know?
Nothing. Forget it.

Journey's Reward.Line: How was it?
It made me think... about a lot of things. The events of the past, what's to come... What about you? Wasn't it always your dream to travel abroad on your own?
Yeah. Especially with all that's happened...
It made me realize that one lifetime is too short.
You only get one. That's why you have to live it to the fullest.
It's not enough.
Isn't that why you find people to carry on your legacy?
Yes, but... I'd rather do it myself.
Someone's ambitious. Okay, then how many lifetimes would you want?
Hmm... Twelve. No, thirteen.
Th-th-thirteen?! You've gotta be kidding. Why so many?
That's what it'll take to rebuild the world.
You must have one amazing plan in that head of yours.
Scratch that. One more to explore the new world.
Fourteen?!
We all have our dreams.
Dreams, huh?
Yeah. What's yours? To become a Keyblade Master?
I want... to stay true to light.
Hm? What brought that on?
In case anyone finds themselves lost in the darkness, I want to be a beacon that guides them back.
I see.
Hey! Are you laughing at me?
No, it's the perfect dream for you.

I mean, think about it. Knowing you, if you wound up wandering into the darkness, you'd try to escape on your own and just end up heading deeper in. But not if I were around to rescue you. You're welcome, buddy.
It's true that running away isn't my forte, unlike someone I know. Thanks for always being there.
I'm the best, right?

Doubt.Line: Are we the only ones who made it back?
Hermod and Urd... And Bragi and Baldr in the Underworld...
Yes. We went to the Olympus Coliseum together, but we don't know what happened to him.
How can that be... So it begins. I will evacuate the remaining students. Do not leave this  classroom.
Master Odin! What's going on? That look tells me you know what's going on.
No... How could this happen!? Why!?
He lost his sister. Anyone would be weak to darkness after that. Where are you going?
Master Odin went to deal with him, right? I'm going too. I'm gonna purge the darkness in Baldr's heart.

VS Vidar.Line: Things seem to be under control here. Let's leave it to them.
It feels like forever ago when we first left this world. I don't want to lose any more of my friends. I need to get Baldr back. Help me, Xehanort.
Even knowing what he's done? All right.
Vidar... What are you doing here?
It turns out Baldr was taken over by darkness. And now we're the only ones left.
I didn't think he'd turn on any of you...
Yes. I knew darkness had chosen him as its vessel, but I couldn't bring myself to take his life. I'm sorry.
None of this would've happened if you'd protected Hoder! Darkness wouldn't have found a way in to Baldr's heart, and we'd all still be training to become Keyblade Masters!
Eraqus, no- don't let your anger take over. That's what happened to Baldr.
My anger might take over, but the darkness won't!
If this will make you feel better, let's do it.

Baldr's Darkness.Line: That's enough, Eraqus. You wanted to defeat the darkness, not your classmates. Remember?
Baldr was- I never thought he was the kind of person who could fall to darkness.

I didn't want to believe it either. He's the brother of a good friend. That's why I was willing to bet on Kingdom Hearts and purge it all. But that's not going to happen now. And even if I could, I wouldn't.
She headed to the tower... to report to Master Odin about her return. I told her that he's likely to be there, meditating.
So you haven't managed to gather the seven lights. I could play the part, if you like.
I was worried you'd tell everyone my secret. You've known for a while, haven't you?
Baldr, darkness may have found a way inside your heart, but you're still you. I'll bring you back to us!
Are you sure you want to do that? We're one now. If I disappear, he will too.
There's no time to debate this. We have no other choice.
Did you really think I'd let you even try? I have business at the tower. My friends will keep you company.
The tower... He's going after Vor!
You've done enough. Leave Vor to us.

To Vor.Line: I'm not the Baldr you knew anymore.

Fallen to Darkness.Line: She's gone... They couldn't protect her, and now they're gone too... Why couldn't they? Why wouldn't they? Did they disappear? Were they erased? I made my sister disappear... I made her friends disappear... A world without her may as well fall to darkness...
If you no longer have hope for this world, purge it. Plunge the thirteen lights into shadow.

The True Story.Line: I heard about your sister. Is this all because of her?
Hoder? Oh, no. In fact, I'm the one who got rid of her.
Hoder, Heimdall, Helgi, Sigrun... The younger ones, Bragi, Urd, and Hermod were especially easy. You'll make eight.
You... You won't get away with this!

A Place to Return.Line: Vidar!? Vidar, he... darkness took Heimdall and the others from us.
I thought as much. The loss of Hoder was too much for Baldr. I don't blame him, we're responsible too.
Then make it up to him. Accept your fate.
There's only one thing we can do for you now.
Go peacefully. May your heart be your guiding key.
Do your worst! This wasn't the plan.
I'm sorry. It's up to you now...
You don't have to apologize for this...
Not for this. I'm sorry I left you... my friends... behind... This is where I belong...
That leaves twelve and lucky thirteen. We've come this far. Let's finish this somewhere worthy of the occasion.

Lights and Darknesses.Line: The actors are assembled. The stage is set. The thirteen darknesses will be completed here and now.
The key to summoning Kingdom Hearts. Thirteen lights must be given to the shadows.
You were after Kingdom Hearts too?
Wait. Calling on that power would purge the world, which means that darkness- you- would disappear.
You don't get it. Once all is purged, the world will be reborn in darkness.
So Vidar's plan wouldn't have worked... It was all for nothing.
Not at all. I paved a path for him to succeed, if he had only followed it to the end.

Oh, do I have to explain everything? Fine, consider this a parting gift. My first move was to get rid of Hoder and spur Vidar to seek revenge. But once he found out who he needed to destroy, he wouldn't be able to do it.
And he'd turn to Kingdom Hearts.
That's right. The second was to deal with Heimdall and the others.
I needed to make sure Vidar followed my plan. They were incentive.
If Vidar started gathering the seven lights just like you wanted, why did you appear to us? You could've just sat back and watched everything unfold like you planned.
Because he gave up on summoning Kingdom Hearts.
They got cold feet, so it was time for a third move. A personal touch. Checkmate. No more schemes, no more games. I win, you lose, the end!

Two Kinds of People.Line: Now, Xehanort! Drive out the darkness! Wait! We can still save him!
Xehanort, don't...
What's going on?
Xehanort, put that away.
Baldr... Stop!
You think I'm true darkness, but you're wrong.
Then prove it.
Hearts aren't ruled by just light and darkness; it's not that simple. Take you, for example. Which holds sway over yours?

Can you swear your heart isn't tainted by even a hint of shadow? That you are like the light, shining brilliantly, ever by our side? Do you really think that you are like them? We are the same, Xehanort. You and I, we stand by the light only to cast shadows and beget darkness; you with Eraqus, me with my sister. And when that light disappears, we lose our purpose and are swallowed by the void.
You don't know what you're talking about.

Believe what you will, but I'm not the ancient darkness you suspect. I am the unknown- that which you fear- and that fear is what gave me shape and form. I am the terror in your minds, the shadow that lurks in the forgotten recesses of your hearts.
You were born from Baldr's heart?

From all of yours. Baldr was especially sensitive to the hearts of others, as are you, Xehanort. And few emotions are more potent than animosity. When Baldr felt the darkness within- darkness born from your unwavering devotion to light- it grew and grew until it became his own. And now, as light watched over us, as you face me, he can see what hides in the  depths of your heart.
The darkness grew and became his own...
That's how all of us- true darkness included- have grown in strength and number over many years.
None of that matters. This ends when I defeat you.
But you can't, which is what led to all this sacrifice in the first place!
That anger... Hold on to it.
What?
Stay strong, Baldr.
Hoder... is that you?
Baldr, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to cause you so much pain.
No... It's not your fault. I'm the one who decided to chase after you, and that's why you-

Baldr, it's okay. I wouldn't have done it differently. Listen to me- I borrowed Xehanort's heart for this chance because I was worried about you. Because I wanted to tell you that the world isn't such a bad place.

That's not it, Hoder. I was scared. Ever since I was little, I could sense what was in people's hearts... but believed I was safe with you because there was nothing but light. But the more darkness I felt, the deeper my heart sank into the abyss. It started to consume me, until one day, I realized the darkness I thought was theirs was in truth mine. I resigned myself to it because I thought that's just how it was. And then I met others like you... hearts filled with  nothing but light. I understood then that there were two kinds of people- people like you and Eraqus, and people like me. I knew I would be left behind. That's why I chased after you and your light.
Two kinds of people...
You don't have to be afraid anymore.
Okay. Why are you doing this?
I could ask you the same thing.
I knew you would never understand...
Wait!
You and your weak heart. What-? These chains-!
Master Odin!
Master Odin!
This is our only chance. Xehanort, rid him of the darkness!
Xehanort!

Xehanort... Do you see now? There's them... and there's us. When we find the strength to pursue our goals, they condemn us, insisting that our strength comes from darkness. That the friends we've lost... were just stepping stones to pave our path. I see myself... in you... Seek answers... to the unjust ways of the world... to the darkness... Nooo!
Xehanort...
I finally see the truth of those words. Destiny can be so cruel...

Comfort in Light.Line: Hermod... Urd... Bragi... Vor... Baldr... Now you and your sister will always be together. You'll always have the light to share.
Oh...
I didn't expect to see you here so early.
Not that early, clearly. You beat me with the flowers.
I don't think there's such a thing as too many.
Maybe not.
How's Master Odin?
Why don't you go see for yourself? You've been cooped up in your room since... everything. And Master Odin? I hardly recognize him. Just a glum old man these days.
I'll be sure to tell him you said so.
Whoa, so is that how it is? I thought you might've learned a little humility in the time we've been apart, but I see you're still you.
And you're still you. Always the joker.
Personally, I prefer "sunny and delightful."
Is that really how you see yourself?
Finally got you to laugh!
You make it hard not to.
Life should be fun, right?
Says the person weeping loudly night after night, alone in his room.
Hey! Eavesdropping is not cool.
You're in the next room. I couldn't tune you out if I tried.
Fair enough. So it sounds like Master Odin is trying to put things back to normal. He's thinking of having us take the Mark of Mastery exam.
Really? Already?
Apparently, he's stopped accepting new apprentices. He wants us to take his place so he can retire.
Oh...

His plan is to leave Scala ad Caelum... and settle down in some cozy little world. Not right away, mind you. But after all that's happened, and how few of us are left... He said it was time for a change.
Maybe it is.
Hey, are you up for a game? It's been ages since we've played!
Do you really want to lose that badly?
I like to think of it as learning from someone more experienced.
What? You've been at this longer than I have.
Yeah, but you're older.
Just barely. I don't think it matters.
It does! You've always been way ahead of me. After all, I'm the one chasing after you from behind all the time.
All right. Light, huh? Hold on to that dream of yours.
Huh? You say something?
How on earth did you hear that?!
Guess it wasn't him after all.

Bragi's True Form.Line: The darkness here is dense. Your usual methods won't work.
It's tragic... Our friends will be devastated to hear that Cerberus took you from us. Any last words you'd like me to pass along?
No... This is the end. For both of us.
Xehanort's onto you. You go back without me, and his suspicions are confirmed.
Then I won't go back. I don't need to. I just need you out of the way.
Hm... You've got me in a tight spot. With all the trouble you've caused, you'd draw too much attention as a vessel. I think I'd rather keep this body a little longer.
You think you're strong enough to beat me? As if! But I don't really want to get in your way or fight or anything. So I'm just gonna disappear, and everyone will forget about me.
Tough luck. No chosen one yet. But Xehanort could be useful... It'll be hard to show my face... if I'm supposed to be buried here.

Child of Destiny.Line: Yes. You share a bloodline with a renowned Keyblade wielder.
You've told me that a hundred times. But what's a child of destiny?
A special child that saves the world from darkness.
You will meet and interact with many people. Those interactions will shape your emotions, your thoughts, and lead you on your destined path.
But we're the only ones here.
The day will come for you to leave this island.
Really? But I thought I had to live here so darkness wouldn't find me.
Indeed, but only until you are strong enough to overcome the darkness.
When I get strong enough, will I get to see my mom again too?

Yeah, she's my mom. But I don't really remember her. Oh! I know some people I want to meet. The kids from my dreams. I don't know who they are, but they really like each other. Is that what having friends is like?

Umm... One's a boy with curly silver hair. Another boy has black clothes and a hat, a skinny boy with pink hair, and a quiet boy with blond hair. Oh, and a girl with dark hair just like my mom. And then there's this other one. Kind of like you.
You can sense what's in the hearts of others. Without a doubt, you are the child of destiny.

I've experienced much in my two lifetimes, some of which I've shared with you. But there is still so much left to tell. Perhaps it's time. In my first life, there was a manuscript that detailed the future- the Book of Prophecies. It was given to a dear friend, but most of what was written within was to be kept secret. In my second life, I learned that light was to expire and darkness prevail, but that the child of destiny would change this outcome. They would have the ability to feel, share, and embrace what others felt in their hearts, and even connect their heart with another to become one. He would hail from the isles of destiny. Perhaps it's still too soon. The end of my time has come. You will leave the Destiny Islands behind and embark on a journey in which you encounter many people. Your childhood dreams are a precious memory I still hold dear. You saw what you felt within my heart, and through your journey, you will connect with many others the same way you did with me. But not all hearts are good. Some may poison yours, and move you to feel fear and hatred. Hurt and sorrow. Even the torment of loved ones lost. You will be tested by darkness, time and time again. But still you must press on. In time, your path will lead you... unto light and fellowship. I believe you will become light's master. I say this with conviction because coursing through your veins is the blood of Ephemer, a dear friend of mine.
